li.The minor is not open to Statistics majo: The minor is not open to Statistics majors.

courseSection0.text: The minor is not open to Statistics majors.

li.A minimum grade of \"C\" (2.0) is requir: A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 15 hours used in the minor must: At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Statistics and Data Science.
li.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Statistics and Data Science.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
STA4163 - Statistical Methods II (3)
STA4164 - Statistical Methods III (3)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
STA2023 - Statistical Methods I (3)
STA3032 - Probability and Statistics for Engineers (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 9 credits from the following types of courses: 
Select from upper division STA prefix courses taught within the Statistics and Data Science Department.
courseSection1.text1: NOTE: STA 3032 - Probability and Statistics for Engineers CANNOT be used as a restricted elective.

li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection1.text:
Other Requirements

Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
